title: Prevenar Inj 1x1 (P)
details: It is used to prevent occurrence of Pneumonia.
precautions: Administration of vaccine should be postponed in subjects suffering from acute severe febrile illness.
effects: Redness, Tenderness, or Swelling where the shot is given, Low grade fever, Occasional incidence of fussiness, drowsiness, or loss of appetite, may occur.
